answers.author: Andy White
answers.text:
Check with Broward County Library in Florida.  I think they have horror stories as well as success stories.  We have two public library branches in elementary schools.  It is a very broad, simple MOU.   In my 25 years in public libraries, I feel that these joint use facilities are better than nothing, but the mission of a public library and that of an educational institution have some areas for conflict.  I would look for every alternative before pursuing a joint use facility.

author: Roger Kolman
text: The city and the local college district are contemplating the joint construction and operation of a municipal/college library on the new campus the college will be constructing.  Has anyone ever entered into a similar agreement?  What was the structure of the joint oversight, i.e. was a joint powers board formed or did one entity or the other take operational responsibility for the facility?
title: Joint Facilities
